CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product AS SELECT b.id, b.name, b.description, b.notes, b.pinned, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, b.update_date FROM ruleform.product b LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON b.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON b.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product OWNER TO core;
